ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: for the Companions of the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For those of the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All this will be for the People on the Right;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: For the sake of the companions of the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: like of age for the Companions of the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For those on the right hand;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: For the fellows on the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: for the People of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For the Companions of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For those on the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: for the Companions of the Right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For the companions of the right [who are]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:38] for those of the right [hand] (li-ashābi’l-yamīni is the relative clause of [either] ansha’nāhunna, ‘We have created them’, or ja‘alnāhunna, ‘[We] made them’), who are:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For those on the right hand) for the inhabitants of Paradise and all of them are the inhabitants of Paradise;
